article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide Defense Advanced GPS Receivers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $12,437,659 firm-fixed-price and modification contract for the order of 4,592 Defense Advanced GPS Receiver (DAGR) units and assorted accessories through the exercise of 30 corresponding options on the DAGR follow-on contract. Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
